actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce the 5-month waiting period for disability benefits to 1 month and provide for retroactive payments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Reduces the five-month waiting period for disability benefits under Title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and provides for retroactive payments under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce the 5-month waiting period for disability benefits to 1 month and provide for retroactive payments.
